sect1.title: Writing Filters
sect1.para: Zend_Filter supplies a set of commonly needed filters, but developers will often need to write custom filters for their particular use cases. The task of writing a custom filter is facilitated by implementing Zend_Filter_Interface.

Zend_Filter_Interface defines a single method, filter(), that may be implemented by user classes. An object that implements this interface may be added to a filter chain with Zend_Filter::addFilter().
